tool_description: Manages internal and external links within knowledge base articles, validates link integrity, suggests related articles, and maintains link relationships for better content navigation.

article_content.description: Article content to analyze for link management

operation.description: Operation type: extract_links, validate_links, suggest_links, or update_links

link_types.description: Types of links to process: internal, external, or both

related_articles.description: List of related article IDs for link suggestions

error_messages: Invalid operation: Must be one of extract_links, validate_links, suggest_links, or update_links
Empty content: Article content cannot be empty
Invalid link types: Must include internal, external, or both
Too many related articles: Maximum of 20 related articles can be processed
Content format error: Article content must contain valid markup for link processing
usage: Provide article_content and operation type. Optionally specify link_types array to focus on internal, external, or both types of links, and provide related_articles array for intelligent link suggestions.

extracted_links.description: All links found in the article content

link_status.description: Validation status for each link (valid, broken, redirected)

suggested_links.description: Recommended links to add to the article

broken_links.description: List of links that are broken or inaccessible

link_analysis.description: Summary analysis of the article's link structure
